content: this is a pattern for a long stole gently increasing outward it s an easy pattern to do and is adaptable to any weight of yarn to get the gentle shaping you will be increasing one stitch at each end on each row two stitches increased on each row what you do between those increases is up to you but i ve written out a pattern for eyelets and ridges shown in the sample photo the sample is knit in handspun yarn which adds another level of fun to the project knit at a looser gauge it will drape softly over your shoulders and around your neck the finished size of this sample stole is 61 by 12
